chapters.title: Chapter 20: Into Andor
chapters.info: Naean Arawn, p. 396 (446)—Slim, palely beautiful Andoran noble with big, blue eyes and waves of black hair. She sneers a lot. She opposed Morgase during the Succession. Dyelin exiled her from Caemlyn, as Morgase did long ago, for attempting to take the Lion Throne.
